text:
Hey there, updating to let you know we’ve addressed this by separating the field types and overview content. As a result module field types now show the right sidebar in the doc.
• <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview|Module and Theme Fields Overview>
• <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/module-theme-fields|Module and Theme Fields Types>
For a short period of time, anyone who lands on either page looking for the content that’s been moved will see a message to go to new location.
